parameters: I can move the log from here!
I don't think we can move him.。
There's a stone monument. Do you want to save it?
I was going to make an apple pie.
I don't know if I'll have time to go to the forest now to get it and make it...
If we don't have time, we can make it tomorrow.
You're eating a lot. It's gonna take a while.
I'll gather them as quickly as I can, but you have to follow me, okay?　Mr. Kerr.
Whoa!　You scared the hell out of me!
Are you ready to travel?　You're talking fast.
So you know exactly what I'm thinking.
What are you doing here? I'm a busy man!
（You're looking at me like I'm this guy again.）
It's one thing to go on an adventure with no destination, but... Arle.
I've got a little something interesting for you today.
It's not too late to hear that, is it?
The stories you bring to me.
Why does it always have to be me?
You know what they say, a pretty girl can do anything, right?
Then leave me alone, I'm going on a trip now.
（I can't see the look on Aruru's face as he tries and suffers...）
I can't see the cool part!
Why are you a stick-in-the-mud now?
Have them knead the magic crystal.
If you examine the bookshelf, you will find little tidbits about games and
Sometimes you can find books with strategies and stuff.
Just keep it in the back of your mind.
Have them knead the magic crystal.
Oh!　That's exactly what I'm talking about!
Isn't that the pear of the holy tree!
Oh, good. I guess I got this right.
There's only one life.（no matter what）It wasn't there, but...
You're right. It's not something you can just pick up.
You've been standing in front of my house this whole time?
I knew you'd be quick to take care of business.
In front of the house of a beloved lover, it is also a good time to think about...
Well, I don't think we're going to get any robbers.
It's a good substitute for a guard dog.
Well, I'm done with my business, so I'll be leaving.
Have your servant make you a parfait out of pears.
And tonight, Gunnai... I had a muffled dream with Aruru...
After all, what are the conditions for the fruit to grow?
You should at least teach me that before you leave.
Well, you don't mind if I tell you.
The magic power that unwillingly flows out of humans is absorbed by the plants around them.
That plant produces the same fruit regardless of the type of tree.
There are many reasons for this, but most of them are born after humans have been eaten.
Lured by the fruit, a new race of demons will come...
If we don't rip it off soon, we'll be in trouble.
If you find it, collect it quickly and bring it to me.
But we must be on our guard. New demons may be lured here.
Just don't go collecting them lightly.
I'll try to be here when you need me.
You can make use of that magic circle and enjoy it to the fullest.
It was like, there's more where that came from.
If the dryad is the indirect cause of the berries.
There could be trouble brewing, like this one.
I don't really want you to grow up...
Gghh...（He's got a look on his face that says, Right.）
At any rate, the warp's open at the moment.
Let's go on an expedition while we still can.
I hope there are some ruins that I like.
Have them knead the magic crystal.
How's it going?　How's the trip going?
Have them knead the magic crystal.
Have them knead the magic crystal.
Even though the Seeker is vulnerable.
Knives and accessories can be equipped.
The better prepared you are, the better off you are.
Have them knead the magic crystal.
Have them knead the magic crystal.
The job Seeker does not encounter enemies, but
In some dungeons, you can eat unexpected traps.
The damage floor is just one step away.
It can cause tremendous damage, so be careful.
Have them knead the magic crystal.
Have them knead the magic crystal.
Thank you for your help with the Bandit's hideaway.
Do you have any questions for me?
The magic circle in the basement.
The magic circle in the basement.
That's definitely the magic circle I was going to draw.
Just like you did with Tanaoro.
I don't want to be connected to anything weird...
If you're afraid, I'll tell you where to go.
The destination of the warp deployment is the Suigetsu Forest.
It's a forest in a slightly different part of the country than any other place I've traveled.
Again, I felt the presence of the Pear of the Sacred Tree.
It won't do you any harm if I leave you alone, but...
You're the one with the good instincts.
They'll be able to reach us from other regions anyway.
The magic circle is a service from me.
It's like a case retrieval machine.
What does this have to do with the last traveller's forest?
This one might be the original.
Why didn't you tell me about this one first?
There's a certain order to things.
If I were you, I could observe it with my crystal ball and let it resolve on its own.
That kind of thing is not my thing.
You'll see for yourself with your own eyes and ears.
You just need to explore as much as you can.
I am the king of the demon world.
Even if it's just me being within your sight.
You're the one who's been causing all the trouble...
To me, that's just a game.
Now go and be my queen.
We don't have to make the sun bigger and stuff.
Don't keep me waiting too long, okay?　Arles.
I've never heard of attracting ghosts.
You're right. I should have just made it.
I've had the power to attract unnecessary things to me.
It was built to get us into places we couldn't get into in the first place.
That's about as inconvenient as it gets.
If someone took it, they'd use it for something bad, right?
And when that happens, you're the one who's going to retrieve it.
It's going to be next to impossible to find anyone in a gym uniform from here.
You're the one who thought of that.
That's an excuse I just came up with.
Have them knead the magic crystal.
